skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

skillTree.name: Ritualistic Fury
skillTree.description: Although lacking the finesse of Elven magics, the sorceries of the north are no less potent, for they channel furious, Daemonic power.

skillTree.name: Might of the Swamp
skillTree.description: The swamp will rise again, its inhabitants enjoying the blessings of the Dark Gods once more.

skillTree.name: Miasma of Despair
skillTree.description: The same enchanted mist that obscures Fimir Balefiend dwellings can also be conjured to confound and horrify would-be attackers on the battlefield.

skillTree.name: Eye of the Balefiend
skillTree.description: They can see the Winds of Magic's ebb and flow, enabling them to make the best use of the magical power available.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Lightweight Skins
skillTree.description: Fabric woven and tainted with primordial awareness protects while leaving the wearer light on their feet.

skillTree.name: Bog Blessed
skillTree.description: There is no knowing what ancient powers sleep in the in the under the water. To most, that is.

skillTree.name: Ancient Pathfinder
skillTree.description: Knowledge of trails forgotten by the more civilized races eons ago allow the Balefiend to safely lead the army through the most dangerous of terrain.

effects.description: Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -40% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -60% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Friend of the Warrior Caste
skillTree.description: Few in Fimir society study outside of their caste, but this one has honed their martial prowess with a Fimm relative.

skillTree.name: Mist Walker
skillTree.description: Mist follows the Balefiend everywhere, obfuscating his movements.

skillTree.name: Winds of Time
skillTree.description: Sometimes it's possible to bend time.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.name: Magic Stability
skillTree.description: Only few casters are able to stabilize winds of magic.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.name: Eye of Chaos
skillTree.description: In times long since passed, the Fimir were the chosen of the Dark Gods. Perhaps, one day again...soon.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.name: Beast Tamer
skillTree.description: Decades spent gathering power in the Chaos Wastes has led to a certain affinity for the more savage of the region.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing
	(own armies in province)

Upkeep: -4% for Fimir, Trolls, Frost Wyrm and Feral Manticore units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma
skillTree.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Smoke & Mirrors
skillTree.description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.

skillTree.name: The Enfeebling Foe
skillTree.description: When cast, this spell enfeebles enemy minds; they feel the crushing weight of reality bearing down upon them.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "The Enfeebling Foe"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Withering
skillTree.description: The Wizard destroys their enemies from within, corroding foes' minds with doubt and crisis.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "The Withering"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Withering Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Withering Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Penumbral Pendulum
skillTree.description: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Penumbral Pendulum"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(Lord's army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Pit of Shades
skillTree.description: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Okkam's Mindrazor
skillTree.description: The supernatural solution is often the best; weapons materialise before the caster's allies, allowing them to slice through flesh, soul, and consciousness.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Okkam's Mindrazor"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Tough as Nails
skillTree.description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Valet
skillTree.description: My lord, I believe Iâ€™ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.name: Inspirational
skillTree.description: We all must fight, no matter our station.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: Iâ€™ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Great Orator
skillTree.description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Physician
skillTree.description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Damage Building
skillTree.description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Diabolic Splendour
backgroundSkills.description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +20%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Melancholic
backgroundSkills.description: "Why forlorn? Are you not a king, an emperor â€“ a champion?"

effects.description: Hero self-defence: -10% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Phlegmatic
backgroundSkills.description: A calming presence can be a steadying handâ€¦ but also disquieting.

backgroundSkills.name: Sanguine
backgroundSkills.description: An assured air instils great confidence in your followers.

backgroundSkills.name: Disfiguring Scar
backgroundSkills.description: Such an ugly scar is always memorable.

backgroundSkills.name: Distinguishing Scar
backgroundSkills.description: Clearly a veteran of some heroic deed.

backgroundSkills.name: Sneaky
backgroundSkills.description: Skulk and sneak or shadow and stalk, theirs is a guileful nature.

backgroundSkills.name: Stupid
backgroundSkills.description: Shares the intellect of a River Troll.

backgroundSkills.name: Uncompromising
backgroundSkills.description: Others may call it decisive, but being uncompromising can be a weakness as well as a strength.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Diabolic Splendour
backgroundSkills.description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

backgroundSkills.name: Power!
backgroundSkills.description: I feel daemonic power within me!

backgroundSkills.name: Lord of the Horde
backgroundSkills.description: Give own power to others... Not very wise.

backgroundSkills.name: Twisted Servants
backgroundSkills.description: Spawns gather around him and hear his commands.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Fimir Warrior units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Chaos Trolls
backgroundSkills.description: Chaos Trolls are highly honoured in the eyes of the Changer of the Ways, for rarely does any creature combine mutation with such size, power, and sheer vitality.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 10% for Norscan Trolls & Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Warriors of the Gods
backgroundSkills.description: Physically powerful, armed and armoured with both steel and sorcery, filled with evil intent. Are they even Human?

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Marauder units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Tamer of Giants
backgroundSkills.description: Chaos Giants are instinctively drawn to those who bear the favour of the Dark Gods.

Melee attack: +4 for Norscan Giant units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +4 for Norscan Giant units

backgroundSkills.name: No rest, only blood!
backgroundSkills.description: The blood of our enemies lies here...

backgroundSkills.name: Chosen are Here!
backgroundSkills.description: Chosen wont serve this little worm, step aside!

backgroundSkills.name: Just War!
backgroundSkills.description: The Chaos Gods look on us and smile, there is only war!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Leader of Forsaken
backgroundSkills.description: Forsaken by the Gods, now, they fight only out of a dark, unnatural hunger and madness.
